channel.title: Comments for page "Silver Clover"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Silver Clover"

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded:
Does mixing a Silver Clover with a Silver Ringlet really create a Silver Clover? It doesn't make any sense - why would you do it? You'd be throwing away a Silver Ringlet.

I was cleaning up this page and wanted to check whether this is a typo or not before I delete it.
